meta.title: Icon
meta.summary: Icons are presentational building blocks used across components and slots. The `mx-icon` element exposes lightweight typography-driven customization via CSS variables.
whenToUse: Use as a presentational companion with button, fab, and text-field slots.
Set icon font and size via CSS custom properties for consistent theming.
pitfalls: Do not rely on icon-only content to communicate critical meaning without text or ARIA labeling context.
deltas: Material Symbols font selection is controlled by `--md-icon-font` CSS variable.
